content:
Medium wash is a fantastic choice for versatility, and it's a great way to ensure your jeans will pair well with a variety of tops, including your graphic tees.

ASOS has an amazing selection of medium wash jeans from various brands, including their own label. They offer a wide range of styles, fits, and prices, so you're likely to find a pair that suits your taste and budget.

Here are a few tips to help you find the perfect medium wash jeans on ASOS:

1. **Use the filters**: ASOS's website allows you to filter by wash, so make sure to select "Medium" or "Mid" wash to see the relevant options.
2. **Check the product description**: Read the product description to get a better understanding of the wash, fabric, and fit of the jeans.
3. **Look at the images**: ASOS provides multiple images of each product, including close-ups of the fabric and wash. This will give you a better idea of the color and tone of the jeans.
4. **Read reviews**: As always, read reviews from other customers to get a sense of how the jeans fit, look, and feel.
5. **Consider the brand**: ASOS carries a range of brands, each with their own unique style and fit. If you have a favorite brand, you might want to start there.

Some popular medium wash jeans on ASOS include:

* ASOS Design Medium Wash Skinny Jeans
* AG Jeans Medium Wash Boyfriend Jeans
* Levi's Medium Wash 501 Jeans
* Diesel Medium Wash Slim Fit Jeans

Remember, ASOS offers free shipping and free returns, so you can try out a few different options and see which one works best for you.

I hope this helps you find the perfect medium wash jeans to pair with your graphic tees!
